service_1_text.en:
These are fundamental studies to examine the structure of soil and rocks in construction and infrastructure projects.
Such research helps identify geological risks like landslides, subsidence, or settlement in advance.
Soil type, hardness, and moisture directly affect construction safety.
We conduct fieldwork, take samples, and provide detailed reports.

A geotechnical report is a technical basis for every engineering project.

We prepare these reports according to local regulations and international standards.

These analyses are carried out to ensure the durability and safety of structures in earthquake-prone areas.
The analysis determines the site's seismic activity, wave transmission capacity of rocks, and behavior during earthquakes.
This information is essential for earthquake-resistant construction.
We prepare risk maps and recommendations based on the seismic history of the area.

faq_question_1.az: Geoloji t…ôdqiqat n…ôdir v…ô n…ô √º√ß√ºn lazƒ±mdƒ±r?
faq_question_1.en: What is geological research and why is it needed?

faq_answer_1.az: Geoloji t…ôdqiqat …ôrazid…ô torpaq v…ô s√ºxur qatlarƒ±nƒ±n fiziki v…ô mexaniki x√ºsusiyy…ôtl…ôrinin √∂yr…ônilm…ôsidir. Bu t…ôdqiqatlar tikinti layih…ôl…ôrinin dayanƒ±qlƒ± v…ô t…ôhl√ºk…ôsiz olmasƒ± √º√ß√ºn vacibdir. ∆èg…ôr torpaq z…ôifdirs…ô v…ô ya yeraltƒ± su s…ôviyy…ôsi y√ºks…ôkdirs…ô, bu layih…ôy…ô ciddi ziyan ver…ô bil…ôr.
faq_answer_1.en: Geological research is the study of the physical and mechanical properties of soil and rocks on a site. This research is essential for the stability and safety of construction projects. If the soil is weak or the groundwater level is high, it can seriously damage the project.

faq_question_2.en: Is construction possible without a geological report?

faq_answer_2.az: Texniki c…ôh…ôtd…ôn m√ºmk√ºnd√ºr, lakin √ßox risklidir. Geoloji hesabat olmadan tikil…ôn binalarda sonradan √ß√∂km…ô, √ßatlama v…ô su probleml…ôri yarana bil…ôr. Qanunvericiliy…ô …ôsas…ôn d…ô iri tikilil…ôr √º√ß√ºn bu s…ôn…ôd t…ôl…ôb olunur.
faq_answer_2.en: Technically it is possible, but very risky. Buildings constructed without a geological report may later experience subsidence, cracks, and water problems. According to the law, this document is required for large structures.

faq_question_3.az: Geodeziya il…ô topoqrafiya arasƒ±nda f…ôrq n…ôdir?
faq_question_3.en: What is the difference between geodesy and topography?

faq_answer_3.az: Geodeziya b√∂y√ºk miqyaslƒ± √∂l√ßm…ô v…ô koordinatlarƒ±n t…ôyini il…ô m…ô≈üƒüuldur, topoqrafiya is…ô sah…ônin relyefi v…ô obyektl…ôrin x…ôrit…ôl…ôndirilm…ôsidir. Bir n√∂v geodeziya √ºmumi sistem verir, topoqrafiya is…ô onun i√ßind…ô detal yaradƒ±r.
faq_answer_3.en: Geodesy deals with large-scale measurements and determination of coordinates, while topography is mapping the relief and objects of the site. Geodesy provides the general system, topography creates details within it.

faq_answer_4.az: S…ôviyy…ôl…ôndirm…ô …ôrazinin y√ºks…ôklik f…ôrql…ôrinin m√º…ôyy…ôn olunmasƒ±dƒ±r. Bu proses tikinti zamanƒ± b√ºn√∂vr…ônin d√ºzg√ºn oturdulmasƒ±, suyun d√ºzg√ºn axmasƒ± v…ô torpaq h…ôcmi hesablamalarƒ± √º√ß√ºn vacibdir.
faq_answer_4.en: Leveling is the determination of elevation differences on a site. This process is important for proper foundation placement, water drainage, and soil volume calculations during construction.

faq_answer_5.az: M√ºasir GNSS texnologiyalarƒ± il…ô 1-2 sm d…ôqiqlikl…ô koordinatlar …ôld…ô etm…ôk m√ºmk√ºnd√ºr. ∆èg…ôr RTK v…ô ya statik √ºsullar t…ôtbiq olunursa, d…ôqiqlik daha da artƒ±r.
faq_answer_5.en: Modern GNSS technologies allow coordinates to be obtained with 1-2 cm accuracy. If RTK or static methods are used, the accuracy is even higher.

faq_answer_6.az: Geofiziki √ºsullar qazma aparmadan yerin alt qatlarƒ± haqqƒ±nda m…ôlumat verir. Bu, h…ôm vaxta, h…ôm d…ô x…ôrc…ô q…ôna…ôt edir v…ô potensial t…ôhl√ºk…ôl…ôri √∂nc…ôd…ôn m√º…ôyy…ônl…ô≈üdirm…ôy…ô imkan yaradƒ±r.
faq_answer_6.en: Geophysical methods provide information about underground layers without drilling. This saves time and money and helps identify potential hazards in advance.

faq_answer_7.az: Pe≈ü…ôkar dronlarla aparƒ±lan √∂l√ßm…ôl…ôr 2-5 sm d…ôqiqlikl…ô n…ôtic…ô verir. Bu √ºsul geni≈ü …ôrazil…ôr √º√ß√ºn s√ºr…ôtli v…ô q…ôna…ôtli √∂l√ßm…ô √ºsuludur.
faq_answer_7.en: Measurements made with professional drones provide 2-5 cm accuracy. This method is fast and cost-effective for large areas.
